flawed_nl_solution:
5 hours in the studio is the same as 5 * 60 = <<5*60=300>>300 minutes.
To record all of his songs, Elvis takes 12 * 10 = <<12*10=120>>120 minutes.
After editing and recording 300 - 120 - 30 = <<300-120-30=130>>130 minutes are left to write all of his songs.
Songwriting therefore took 130 / 10 = <<130/10=13>>13 minutes per song.
#### 13

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 130. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
